title: Coinbase legal chief slams U.S. Treasury’s bid to dismiss Tornado Cash suit
body: Coinbase’s chief legal officer, Paul Grewal, has criticized the U.S. Treasury for trying to dismiss the Tornado Cash lawsuit by claiming the case is now moot. On Mar. 21, the U.S. Department of the Treasury officially removed Tornado Cash and several associated smart contract addresses from its sanctions list, reversing the August 2022 sanctions imposed by the Office of Foreign Assets Control. Regulators had accused the platform of facilitating money laundering activities, including transactions linked to North Korea’s Lazarus Group. The move followed a November 2024 ruling by a federal appeals court, which found the Treasury had overstepped its authority in sanctioning the crypto mixer’s immutable smart contracts. Following the Mar. 21 ruling, the Treasury Department said in a statement that the case should now be considered resolved, arguing that because Tornado Cash and the related smart contracts had been delisted from the specially Designated Nationals list, the lawsuit was effectively “moot.” The US Treasury asserted that the court should assess whether it still has jurisdiction over the case, noting that, like all federal courts, it has a “continuing obligation to satisfy itself” on matters of Article III jurisdiction, and for that reason, “briefing on mootness is warranted.” Grewal, however, argued in a Mar. 24 X post that this approach doesn’t align with the law. “Power does not recede voluntarily. It’s gasps and it gasps until it no longer can After grudgingly delisting TC, they now claim they’ve mooted any need for a final court judgment. But that’s not the law, and they know it.” Paul Grewal, chief legal officer at Coinbase You might also like: US Treasury lifts sanctions on Tornado Cash, allowing access for Americans According to Grewal, this is a textbook example of what’s known as voluntary cessation, a legal principle where a defendant ends a contested action in an attempt to avoid a court ruling. However, this only applies if there is clear assurance that the behaviour will not recur. In Grewal’s view, the Treasury has provided no such guarantee. He referenced a 2024 Supreme Court decision involving a U.S. citizen who had been removed from the No Fly List. The court found that the case was not moot, as the government had failed to offer any assurance that the individual would not be placed back on the list. While Tornado Cash may have been removed from the sanctions list, Grewal noted that the Treasury has given “no assurance” it won’t be added again. “That’s not good enough, and will make this clear to the district court,” he added. Recent developments come a month after Tornado Cash developer Alexey Pertsev was released from prison under electronic monitoring after a Dutch court suspended his pretrial detention, allowing him to focus on appealing his conviction. Meanwhile, Tornado Cash co-founder Roman Storm is currently out on a $2 million bond and is expected to face trial in April. He was charged by U.S. authorities in August 2023, along with fellow co-founder Roman Semenov, for allegedly helping launder over $1 billion in cryptocurrency through the platform. Read more: ‘Freedom is priceless’: Tornado Cash’s Alexey Pertsev released from prison

title: Metaplanet Adds 150 Bitcoin to Tally, Days After Eric Trump's Adviser Appointment
body: Tokyo-based investment firm Metaplanet said Monday it had acquired an additional 150 bitcoin (BTC) to bring its total holdings to 3,350 BTC, valued at approximately $291 million at current market rates. The purchase comes just days after the company made Eric Trump, son of U.S. President Donald Trump, to its newly formed strategic advisory board. He is expected to bring a high-profile perspective to Metaplanet’s ambitions. Metaplanet is working to boost its value for shareholders by buying and holding bitcoin, using a measure called BTC Yield to track how well this plan is working. BTC Yield shows the percentage change in the amount of Bitcoin they own compared to the total number of shares, over a set time. From July to September 2024, their BTC Yield was 41.7%, meaning their bitcoin stash grew steadily compared to shares. Then, from October to December 2024, it jumped to 309.8% because they bought a lot more bitcoin while its price soared. So far in 2025, from Jan. 1 to March 24, they’ve hit a BTC Yield of 68.3%, per Monday’s documents .

title: Ripple Co-Founder Funds Space Station with XRP Profits
body: Jed McCaleb, co-founder of Ripple and Stellar , is now channeling his cryptocurrency fortune into space exploration. His latest venture, a startup called Vast Space, plans to launch Haven-1—the first commercial space station —by 2026. McCaleb, who earned billions from selling XRP, is expected to provide major financial backing for the project. Vast Space’s CEO, Max Haot, explained that the station is not meant for tourism. Instead, the goal is to create an environment focused on work, team efficiency, safety, and communication. The station is designed to support government astronauts as well as privately funded missions with serious objectives in orbit. If successful, Vast could even help replace the aging International Space Station and become a strong contender for NASA contracts. McCaleb, known for launching major crypto projects like Mt. Gox and Ripple, is fully committed to this mission. He admitted that he could lose up to $1 billion if things don’t go as planned, but said the long-term vision is worth the risk. He emphasized the need for people to support the idea of human life beyond Earth and believes few are willing to take that level of risk. The XRP community has mixed feelings about McCaleb’s move. After leaving Ripple in 2013 due to internal disputes, McCaleb sold off his XRP holdings from 2014 to 2022. His sales—totaling around $3.3 billion—sparked criticism from some XRP supporters who claimed he hurt the project’s value. McCaleb defended his actions, saying he was transparent about leaving Ripple before selling his tokens, giving others a chance to act first. He also reminded the community that he never forced anyone to switch to Stellar Lumens, though that option was available. “I didn’t do that at all. I told the ripple community I was leaving ripple and no longer believed in the project. I did that before I sold my XRP,” McCaleb said on X. “The intent was to let people front run me.” Despite the backlash, Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen has voiced support for the space initiative . He praised Vast as an example of American innovation and said he’s hopeful about its success. According to Larsen, this kind of bold ambition is something the country used to embrace. If Vast achieves its goals, it will serve as a powerful example of how crypto wealth can be used to fuel real-world advancements in science and technology—especially in areas as ambitious as space exploration.

title: Biggest Opportunity Ever? Kiyosaki’s Shocking Bitcoin Prediction Ignites Crypto Frenzy
body: Is Bitcoin the golden ticket to wealth in the 21st century? According to Robert Kiyosaki, the acclaimed author of “Rich Dad Poor Dad,” the answer is a resounding yes! He’s not just dipping his toes into the crypto waters; he’s diving headfirst, declaring the current Bitcoin price as nothing less than the “biggest opportunity in history.” Let’s delve into why Kiyosaki is so bullish on Bitcoin and what this could mean for you. Robert Kiyosaki’s Bold Bitcoin Prediction: A Historic Investment Opportunity In a recent buzz-generating post on X (formerly Twitter), Kiyosaki didn’t mince words. He stated emphatically that Bitcoin represents a monumental investment opportunity . He even took a jab at the potential future FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) crowd, predicting, “If history is any indicator the FOMM crowd will wait till Bitcoin passed $200 k this year and say ‘Bitcoin is too expensive.'” This statement highlights Kiyosaki’s belief in Bitcoin’s upward trajectory and the tendency of many to jump in only after significant price appreciation. [img]Image of Robert Kiyosaki holding ‘Rich Dad Poor Dad’ book with Bitcoin chart in the background[/img] But why is Kiyosaki so convinced about this opportunity ? It boils down to his long-held investment philosophy and his understanding of Bitcoin’s unique value proposition in today’s economic landscape. He views Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and the potential devaluation of fiat currencies. In a world grappling with economic uncertainties, Bitcoin, with its decentralized and limited supply, stands out as a potentially safe haven asset. Why Bitcoin Now? Understanding the Crypto Investment Landscape Kiyosaki’s endorsement isn’t just a fleeting opinion; it’s rooted in a deeper understanding of the crypto market and Bitcoin’s role within it. Here’s a breakdown of why now might indeed be a significant time for Bitcoin, according to proponents like Kiyosaki and others he recommends: Scarcity: Bitcoin’s capped supply of 21 million coins is a fundamental aspect driving its value. Unlike fiat currencies that can be printed at will, Bitcoin’s scarcity is mathematically enforced, potentially making it an effective store of value. Decentralization: Bitcoin operates outside the control of central banks and governments. This decentralization is a key appeal for those seeking alternatives to traditional financial systems, especially in times of economic instability. Growing Institutional Adoption: We are witnessing increasing interest and investment in Bitcoin from institutional players. This institutional adoption lends further legitimacy and stability to the Bitcoin market. Hedge Against Inflation: With inflation rates rising globally, many investors are looking for assets that can preserve their purchasing power. Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a digital gold, offering a hedge against inflationary pressures. Navigating the Crypto World: Insights from Bitcoin Experts While Kiyosaki’s enthusiasm is contagious, he wisely advises a balanced approach to crypto investing. He urges his followers, “Don’t take my word for it,” encouraging them to seek diverse perspectives. He specifically recommends listening to prominent Bitcoin proponents: Jeff Booth: Known for his deep understanding of monetary policy and Bitcoin’s role in a changing financial system. Booth often emphasizes Bitcoin’s potential to fix the flaws in the current monetary order. Michael Saylor: The Chairman of MicroStrategy, a publicly traded company that has heavily invested in Bitcoin. Saylor is a vocal advocate for Bitcoin as a treasury reserve asset and speaks extensively on its long-term value proposition. Samson Mow: A Bitcoin maximalist and CEO of Jan3, a Bitcoin technology company. Mow is known for his strong conviction in Bitcoin’s superiority over other cryptocurrencies and its potential to become the global reserve currency. By listening to these experts, you can gain a more comprehensive understanding of the bullish arguments for Bitcoin and the factors driving its potential growth. The Skeptic’s Corner: Considering the Challenges of Bitcoin Investment To make truly informed decisions, it’s equally crucial to consider the counterarguments. Kiyosaki wisely suggests listening to Bitcoin skeptics as well. What are some potential challenges and risks associated with Bitcoin investment ? Challenge Description Volatility Bitcoin is known for its price volatility. Significant price swings can occur rapidly, which can be unsettling for some investors. Regulatory Uncertainty The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving globally. Changes in regulations could impact Bitcoin’s price and adoption. Security Risks While the Bitcoin network itself is secure, exchanges and individual wallets can be targets for hacking and theft. Secure storage and practices are essential. Complexity Understanding the technology and economics behind Bitcoin can be complex for newcomers. Education and due diligence are necessary. Acknowledging these challenges is not about dismissing Bitcoin’s potential but about approaching investment with realistic expectations and a clear understanding of the risks involved. FOMO and Bitcoin: Are You Ready for the Ride? Kiyosaki’s mention of FOMO is particularly relevant. The “fear of making mistakes” (FOMM), as he cleverly puts it, can often lead investors to hesitate and miss out on potentially significant opportunities. His prediction that people will only jump in when Bitcoin hits $200k highlights this common investor behavior. Are you going to be part of the FOMO crowd, or will you take a proactive approach to understanding and potentially investing in Bitcoin now? Here are some actionable insights to consider: Educate Yourself: Dive deep into understanding Bitcoin, blockchain technology, and the crypto market. Resources are abundant online, from articles and videos to courses and communities. Start Small: You don’t need to invest a fortune to begin. Start with a small, manageable amount that you’re comfortable with losing. This allows you to learn and gain experience without significant risk. Diversify (Wisely): While Kiyosaki is bullish on Bitcoin, diversification is generally a sound investment strategy. Consider how Bitcoin fits into your overall portfolio. Secure Your Holdings: If you do invest in Bitcoin, prioritize security. Use reputable exchanges and consider hardware wallets for long-term storage. Stay Informed: The crypto market is dynamic. Stay updated on market trends, news, and regulatory developments. Conclusion: Seizing the Bitcoin Opportunity with Informed Confidence Robert Kiyosaki’s declaration of Bitcoin as the “biggest opportunity in history” is a powerful statement from a respected voice in the financial world. While his enthusiasm should be considered alongside a balanced perspective, his core argument about Bitcoin’s potential as a store of value and a hedge against economic uncertainties is compelling. By educating yourself, understanding the risks and rewards, and listening to diverse viewpoints, you can position yourself to potentially benefit from what many, including Kiyosaki, believe is a transformative asset class. The future of finance is evolving, and Bitcoin is undoubtedly a key player in this revolution. Are you ready to explore this exciting frontier? To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Pi Network Builds DEX to Fight Price Manipulation
body: The Pi Network community is building its own decentralized exchange (DEX), called PiDaoSwap, in an effort to fight price manipulation by outside exchanges. The move aims to help Pi Coin better reflect its true market value, instead of being influenced by third-party platforms that reportedly distort its price through artificial activity. PiDaoSwap is now in the final stages of development and is expected to launch soon on the Pi Network mainnet. According to community sources, including Pi Network VietNames, the DEX will allow the PI token to trade based on actual market supply and demand, without interference from centralized exchanges. The platform is currently waiting for Know Your Business (KYB) approval from the Pi core team before it can officially launch. Supporters argue that some exchanges and price tracking platforms use bots and fake data to manipulate Pi’s market perception. These alleged activities have led to frustration in the Pi Network community, which claims that these distortions hurt the project’s reputation and adoption. A recent report from BeInCrypto highlighted concerns about suspicious bot activity affecting Pi’s listed value on platforms like CoinMarketCap. Despite growing support for Pi Coin, Binance has yet to list it, further fueling community disappointment. In the meantime, PiDaoSwap has secured verification status on Twitter, showing that the project is gaining momentum even before its official launch. However, the Pi Network team has clear rules when it comes to branding. The project’s intellectual property policy restricts the use of names and domains containing “Pi” or “Pi-related” references without permission. As a result, the developers behind PiDaoSwap may need to consider a name change or rebranding to meet those guidelines. The team has reached out to the Pi core developers to clarify whether their current naming and domain can remain or must be adjusted. The platform’s goal is to support a more transparent and community-led financial system. By removing dependency on third-party exchanges, PiDaoSwap hopes to provide an accurate pricing system for Pi Coin and restore trust among its users. As the launch nears, the Pi Network community remains focused on pushing forward, despite regulatory hurdles and branding restrictions. If successful, PiDaoSwap could become a key tool in preserving the integrity of Pi Coin’s value within its native ecosystem.

title: Bitcoin ETFs See Strong Inflows After Weeks of Losses
body: Bitcoin spot ETFs in the U.S. have finally seen a strong comeback, recording $744 million in net inflows this week after five straight weeks of losses. On March 17 alone, the market experienced its strongest daily gain in over a month, with notable interest from institutional players suggesting that confidence may be returning to the crypto space. The reversal comes after a tough period in February when ETFs saw over $5 billion in outflows, much of it due to institutional sell-offs during volatile market conditions and uncertain macroeconomic signals. March, however, has brought signs of recovery, as more capital has flowed back into Bitcoin-focused funds over six consecutive trading days. Leading the rebound is BlackRock’s ETF product, which saw particularly strong buying activity, while Grayscale’s GBTC continued to show outflows, marking a contrast in institutional behavior between ETF providers. Although some platforms remained flat, the overall movement reflects growing interest from large investors. Crypto figure Zia ul Haque highlighted this shift, suggesting that institutional accumulation may point to behind-the-scenes developments. He noted that many large players sold off earlier in March, contributing to market panic and price dips, but are now quietly accumulating again—a move he sees as a positive sign. While the inflow trend is encouraging, not all market observers believe this signals a full recovery. Some analysts argue that the recent surge in ETF interest may be linked more to arbitrage strategies than genuine long-term investment. These strategies often involve using the price differences between spot ETFs and futures markets to make low-risk gains, which may inflate the appearance of true demand. Kyle Chasse, a well-known analyst, explained that while the demand for ETFs is real, a portion of it was purely tactical. Without actual long-term buyers, market volatility could persist, despite the strong inflow numbers. According to him, until committed investors step in, the market may remain uncertain. Meanwhile, Ethereum ETFs have continued on a negative trend, posting over two weeks of consistent outflows. This contrast highlights differing investor sentiment between the top two cryptocurrencies, with Bitcoin currently viewed as the more stable and favored asset in the eyes of institutions. Bitcoin’s price has not responded significantly to the influx of ETF investments and remains just below key psychological levels. While investor behavior is shifting, the broader market has yet to show clear signs of a sustained rally. Still, the current movement of funds may hint at changing dynamics ahead.

title: Bitcoin Bull Run 2025 Gains Momentum—Key Levels to Watch
body: The post Bitcoin Bull Run 2025 Gains Momentum—Key Levels to Watch appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The cryptocurrency market has seen a growth of 1% in the last 24 hours. During the period, almost all the top ten cryptos, including Bitcoin, have experienced growth . The Bitcoin market has witnessed a significant surge of 3.5%. Currently, the BTC price stands at $87,178.13 – nearly 3.43% above where the market was at the beginning of this month. However, analysts predict a possible pullback. Here is what traders should watch out for. Market Sentiment Restored After Liquidations At a point on March 20, the Bitcoin market touched $87,452.17. Unfortunately, on the same day, the market plummeted by nearly 3.03%. In fact, between March 20 and 22 alone, the market slipped by over 3.51%. However, yesterday, the trend overtuned, as the market rebounded by nearly 2.65%. Currently, the Bitcoin price remains at nearly 2.30% above where the market was at the start of March 23. This indicates that people’s confidence in Bitcoin has been restored. Short-Term Pullback Expected in 1-2 Weeks A post on X by CrypNuevo suggests that the Bitcoin market may experience a retracement within the next one or two weeks. $BTC Sunday update: Market sentiment has been restored after hitting the short liquidations at $87.1k. Now, it could be a good opportunity for the MM to shake out the market again. We may see a pullback from here over the next 1-2 weeks, a retrace of this recovery. ↓ (1/5): pic.twitter.com/ahMmA11IVF — CrypNuevo (@CrypNuevo) March 23, 2025 Pointing out certain crucial patterns observed by him in the one-week chart of Bitcoin, the crypto analyst asserts that the overall bullish trend in the market remains intact. The 50-day EMA of Bitcoin in its one-week chart is $77,726.95. Recently, the BTC market retested this level. Staying above this level is very crucial for Bitcoin, as it is an extremely important bull market support level of this market. The analyst states that as long as the BTC market stands above this support level of $77K, the bullish trend of Bitcoin remains valid. title: Tether Plans Audit Ahead of U.S. Stablecoin Rules
body: Tether, the company behind the world’s largest stablecoin, is reportedly in talks with one of the Big Four accounting firms to carry out a third-party audit. CEO Paolo Ardoino confirmed that discussions are ongoing, aiming to meet requirements expected under upcoming U.S. stablecoin regulations . These regulations would mandate independent audits as a condition for stablecoin issuers looking to operate in the American market. Ardoino emphasized that securing an audit is now a top priority for the company, especially with rising interest from the U.S. government in integrating stablecoins into the financial system. His comments follow a recent statement from former President Donald Trump , who spoke about stablecoins as a way to strengthen the U.S. dollar's global role. Ardoino suggested that this high-level support could push major auditing firms to take Tether’s request more seriously. Despite this, community skepticism remains high. Tether has made similar promises in the past but has never followed through with a full, independent audit. While internal reports are published regularly and a new CFO has taken over, critics argue these moves fall short of true transparency. Some believe Tether may seek a limited audit focused only on its reserves, but full audits are expected under the proposed GENIUS Act, which outlines strict rules for stablecoin issuers. Under the GENIUS Act, companies issuing stablecoins would be required to undergo external audits and maintain reserves in secure assets like U.S. Treasury bonds. Tether claims it already holds a significant amount in such assets, reporting $33 billion in Treasury purchases last year. However, most of these assets are held by Cantor Fitzgerald , a financial firm closely connected to Tether. This link has raised concerns, especially since Cantor Fitzgerald’s former CEO, Howard Lutnick, recently became the U.S. Secretary of Commerce. Critics like Jason Calcanis argue that Tether’s reputation and political ties warrant stronger oversight. He insists Tether should not be allowed to hold U.S. Treasuries until it passes an in-depth audit going back to its early operations. Tether made massive profits last year, suggesting it has the resources to fund a full audit. Still, doubts remain about whether the company is willing to undergo the level of scrutiny required. Without compliance, Tether’s ability to operate in the U.S. may be at risk, despite its strong positioning and influence. The crypto community is watching closely to see whether Tether will finally deliver on its audit promise. As stablecoin regulations move forward, passing a proper audit will be crucial for the company to secure its future in the regulated U.S. market and potentially form partnerships with government entities .

title: Coinbase in Talks to Buy Deribit for Derivatives Push
body: Coinbase is reportedly in discussions to acquire Deribit , the world’s largest crypto derivatives exchange. If completed, this move could dramatically expand Coinbase’s presence in the crypto trading space, especially in the high-volume derivatives market. Deribit recorded close to $1.2 trillion in total trading volume last year across options, futures, and spot products. In comparison, Coinbase has seen limited activity in derivatives, despite launching Coinbase Derivatives in 2021. A successful acquisition would provide Coinbase access to a new and highly profitable market segment. This development follows a period of growth and expansion for Coinbase, particularly after the SEC ended its legal action against the exchange. Coinbase has since introduced new features like verified liquidity pools aimed at both institutional and retail traders. According to a recent Bloomberg report, talks with Deribit are ongoing, though no deal has been finalized. The potential merger is being viewed by some in the industry as a turning point that could help transform Coinbase into a global crypto powerhouse . Market watchers note that derivatives trading offers much higher volumes and revenue opportunities than regular spot markets. In January, Deribit was reportedly in acquisition talks with Kraken, with an estimated valuation of $5 billion, but that deal did not move forward. If Coinbase closes the deal, it could mark one of the most significant mergers in the recent history of the crypto sector. Social media commentators have taken notice of Coinbase’s strategy. Analyst Zach Humphries pointed out that Coinbase is building a “crypto empire,” especially by targeting the growing derivatives space. He noted that this market is where most of the volume — and opportunity — exists. At the same time, Deribit has faced some operational setbacks. Last month, it exited the Russian market due to EU sanctions , impacting its regional reach. A deal with Coinbase, a publicly traded company in the U.S., could bring stability and open up new pathways for growth. There are still no public details about the acquisition price or timeline. However, if the deal goes through, it would give Coinbase an immediate foothold in a space where it has previously lacked scale — positioning the company to compete more aggressively with global players in the derivatives space. As interest in crypto derivatives continues to grow, Coinbase's potential acquisition of Deribit may signal a broader trend of consolidation and expansion in the crypto industry, with derivatives becoming a key revenue driver for leading platforms.

title: Bithumb Unveils KRW Deposits via KB Kookmin Bank: A Win for South Korean Crypto
body: Exciting news for South Korean crypto enthusiasts! Leading crypto exchange Bithumb has just dropped a major announcement that’s set to streamline how you interact with digital assets. Get ready for seamless Korean Won (KRW) deposits and withdrawals directly through KB Kookmin Bank. This development marks a significant step forward for the accessibility of crypto in South Korea. Let’s dive into what this partnership means for you and the broader crypto landscape. Bithumb KB Kookmin Bank Partnership: What’s the Buzz? On [date of announcement, inferring from ‘starting on March 24’], Bithumb officially announced on their website that they are joining forces with KB Kookmin Bank, one of South Korea’s largest banks. This collaboration is all about making it easier for users to move their KRW into and out of the Bithumb exchange. Starting March 24th at 02:00 UTC, you can directly deposit and withdraw KRW through KB Kookmin Bank accounts. This is a game-changer, simplifying the process and potentially opening doors for wider adoption of cryptocurrencies in the nation. Here’s a quick breakdown of what this means: Direct KRW Transactions: Say goodbye to complicated intermediary steps. Deposit and withdraw Korean Won directly between your KB Kookmin Bank account and your Bithumb account. Enhanced Accessibility: For KB Kookmin Bank customers, accessing the crypto market via Bithumb becomes significantly more convenient. Increased Trust: Partnering with a major traditional bank like KB Kookmin Bank can boost confidence in Bithumb and the crypto exchange industry as a whole. Why is Banking for Crypto Important in South Korea? South Korea is a hotbed for cryptocurrency activity. However, navigating the regulatory landscape and securing reliable banking partnerships has been a persistent challenge for crypto exchanges. Traditional banks have often been hesitant to fully embrace the crypto sector due to regulatory uncertainties and perceived risks. This reluctance has sometimes led to hurdles for users trying to fund their crypto accounts or cash out their crypto holdings into fiat currency. The partnership between Bithumb and KB Kookmin Bank is significant because it signals a growing acceptance and integration of crypto within the traditional financial system in South Korea. It suggests that regulatory frameworks might be becoming clearer, encouraging established financial institutions to collaborate with crypto exchanges. This improved banking access is crucial for the sustained growth and mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies in the country. KRW Deposits and Withdrawals: Benefits for Bithumb Users The introduction of direct KRW deposits and withdrawals via KB Kookmin Bank brings a host of benefits for Bithumb users. Let’s explore some key advantages: Convenience and Speed: Direct banking channels are generally faster and more straightforward than alternative methods. Expect quicker deposits and withdrawals, allowing you to react swiftly to market opportunities. Reduced Fees: Depending on the previous methods used for KRW transactions, this new integration could potentially lead to lower transaction fees. Direct bank transfers often have more competitive fee structures. Increased Security: Transacting through established banking channels can provide an added layer of security and trust compared to less regulated or less conventional methods. Wider User Base: The ease of use could attract new users to Bithumb, particularly those who were previously hesitant due to the complexities of funding their accounts. In essence, this move aims to make the entire process of buying, selling, and trading cryptocurrencies on Bithumb more user-friendly and accessible for everyone, from seasoned traders to crypto newcomers. Navigating South Korea Crypto Regulations: A Step in the Right Direction South Korea has been actively developing its regulatory framework for the cryptocurrency industry. While regulations can sometimes seem like hurdles, they are ultimately designed to protect investors and ensure the sustainable growth of the sector. Partnerships like the one between Bithumb and KB Kookmin Bank can be seen as a positive response to these evolving regulations. By collaborating with a regulated financial institution, Bithumb demonstrates its commitment to operating within the established financial system and adhering to compliance standards. This proactive approach can foster a more stable and trustworthy environment for crypto trading in South Korea. It also sets a positive example for other crypto exchanges, potentially encouraging further collaborations with traditional financial institutions. Crypto Exchange Landscape in South Korea: What Does This Mean for Competition? The South Korean crypto exchange market is competitive, with several major players vying for market share. Bithumb securing this banking partnership with KB Kookmin Bank could give them a significant competitive edge. The ease of KRW transactions is a crucial factor for users when choosing an exchange. By offering a more convenient and reliable banking solution, Bithumb could attract users from other exchanges or solidify its position as a leading platform. Other exchanges may now feel pressure to secure similar banking partnerships to remain competitive. This could lead to a wave of collaborations between crypto exchanges and traditional banks in South Korea, ultimately benefiting the entire crypto ecosystem by making access easier and more secure for everyone involved. Actionable Insights for Crypto Users in South Korea So, what should you do with this information? Here are some actionable insights for crypto users in South Korea: If you are a Bithumb user and a KB Kookmin Bank customer: Get ready to enjoy streamlined KRW transactions starting March 24th! Explore the new deposit and withdrawal options on the Bithumb platform after the launch. If you are considering joining a crypto exchange in South Korea: Bithumb’s partnership with KB Kookmin Bank makes it an attractive option due to the ease of banking integration. Keep an eye on other exchanges: Expect other South Korean crypto exchanges to potentially announce similar banking partnerships in the near future to stay competitive. title: Top Analyst Says XRP Mathematically Points Toward $10. Here’s why
body: Blockchain Backer (@BCBacker), a well-known cryptocurrency analyst, recently shared his insights on XRP’s potential price trajectory in a new market cycle. The analyst linked to a YouTube video where he used historical data, Fibonacci extensions, and the XRP-to-Bitcoin ratio, to outline a possible path for the altcoin to reach between $8 and $10, noting that the chart mathematically points toward this target range. XRP Price Chart Mathematically Points to $8-10 with XRPUSD and XRP vs Bitcoin https://t.co/R81AaGowVF — Blockchain Backer (@BCBacker) March 21, 2025 Price Target Based on Fibonacci Extensions According to Blockchain Backer’s analysis, XRP’s price movements align with historical Fibonacci extensions observed in past market cycles. In previous rallies, assets such as Ethereum and Litecoin have followed similar patterns, reaching 4.236 Fibonacci extensions from key breakout levels. Applying this method to XRP suggests a price target of approximately $8.68 to $10.40 at the next peak. The projection relies on a key assumption: Bitcoin’s price movement will guide XRP’s trajectory. If Bitcoin reaches an estimated cycle top of $127,000, then XRP achieving 8,200 sats (its value relative to Bitcoin) would result in a price of $10.40. If Bitcoin instead tops out at $116,800, the expected XRP price would be $9.57. Bitcoin’s Influence on Market Performance Bitcoin’s market cycle has historically dictated the performance of altcoins. However, Blockchain Backer pointed out that altcoins typically do not peak at the same time as Bitcoin but rather during its retracement phase. This means the XRP’s highest price would likely occur when Bitcoin is cooling off from its peak, rather than during Bitcoin’s all-time high. Furthermore, XRP’s price has followed a pattern of strong rallies when Bitcoin dominance begins to decline . This pattern suggests that the altcoin’s next major breakout could occur in a post-peak Bitcoin environment, as capital flows from Bitcoin into altcoins. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Realistic Expectations A significant factor in evaluating XRP’s potential is its market capitalization. Blockchain Backer emphasized that without an extreme Bitcoin rally beyond $200,000 to $300,000, XRP exceeding $10.40 is unlikely. The digital asset is currently trading at $2.28, and the projected increase of over 300% aligns with the historical altcoin cycle, making the $8–$10 range a reasonable target based on past performance. Notably, other analysts have also shared similar targets for the digital asset. If Bitcoin surpasses expectations and reaches significantly higher prices, XRP’s upper limits could expand. However, based on the current market structure and previous cycles, the $8–$10 range remains the most probable outcome. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author’s personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid’s opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. title: OKX developer spills details about OKX Wallet app ‘too early’
body: OKX web3 product manager Kyle Chen declared the platform’s standalone wallet app is now available on Google Store. However, he later realized he shared the news ‘too early.’ On Mar. 24, Chen apologized to users after admitting that he had revealed the news about the standalone wallet app “too early.” This is because the app is not yet available in some regions and devices. Moreover, he does not mention which regions are able to access the app during this time nor does he reveal when the app will be available for all users. “It may not be available for users in some regions and devices. Please be patient. My colleagues in the marketing department are going to scold me,” wrote Chen in a translated post . In a previous X post , Chen revealed to his followers that the crypto exchange has launched an independent app for its wallet service. According to Chen’s post, users can download the application by searching for it on the Google Play Store. “The bull is coming back fast! Open the app market and search for OKX Wallet to download the standalone OKX Wallet app,” said Chen, adding that it is not yet available on Apple’s App Store. You might also like: Bitget Wallet launches new SuperDEX upgrade after OKX suspends DEX aggregator In a separate post, Chen shared a screenshot of the platform’s interface and said the app would include a “Token AI Narrative Summary” feature. The new feature would enable users to view real-time market sentiments, including long and short position insights and the latest online discourse from X. He also hints that “bigger features are on the way” for OKX Wallet. However, Chen said these features would not be exclusive for the app. For users that are unable to download the application because it is unavailable in their regions, he explained that they can access the Token AI Narrative Summary through the website. “To view [insights on] the DEX Market or any popular token, click on insights to see the AI ​​analysis summary of the token. Feedback and suggestions are welcome!” said Chen. Earlier this month, OKX announced that it would temporarily suspend its decentralized exchange aggregator service in light of an attempted hack. The hack was suspected to come from North Korea’s Lazarus Group . According to the notice, the platform would use the suspension as an opportunity to develop more security measures to prevent future attacks. Read more: OKX suspends DEX aggregator service due to detection of North Korean Lazarus attack

title: Dogecoin Is ‘Ready For The Next Big Move,’ Warns Analyst
body: In a fresh market update shared on X, crypto analyst Kevin (@Kev_Capital_TA) presented a weekly DOGE/USD chart suggesting that Dogecoin could be nearing what he describes as a pivotal inflection point. He stated, “My Dogecoin Community it is about that time where I must provide you the Alpha you all desire. If we take a look at DOGE on the weekly time frame we can see that we received a weekly demand candle last week at the ‘Last line of bull market support’ that I pointed out a couple of weeks ago.” Analyst Sees Big Move Coming For Dogecoin He emphasized the significance of $0.139, calling it vital that Dogecoin maintain this level and explaining that, in his opinion, this zone represents a rare opportunity with “phenomenal” risk-reward potential. He noted, “It will continue to be absolutely vital that Dogecoin hold this level while it resets higher time frame indicators like the 3 Day MACD, Weekly Stoch RSI and 2W Stoch RSI all of which are getting very close to being fully reset.” By referencing these oscillators, Kevin underscored that Dogecoin’s momentum profile seems to be approaching a state in which downward pressure could dissipate and bullish forces could resurface. He explained that the Weekly Stoch RSI, for example, is already fully reset, and that the 3-Day MACD is “getting closer to fully resetting,” while the Two-Week (2W) Stoch RSI may still need around another month before it is aligned with the lower, reset region. This combination of technical conditions often attracts traders who regard such convergences as signals that a market may be primed for a marked price move. Related Reading: Whales Accumulate Over 120 Million Dogecoin In Past Week – Analyst Kevin framed his outlook by saying, “In my opinion this continues to be a spot where the risk reward ratio on Doge is absolutely phenomenal given that if we lose $0.139 durable on weekly closes you can cut your trades/losses but your upside potential outweighs your downside risk by miles.” In essence, he is placing the onus on Dogecoin’s ability to remain above $0.139 on a weekly closing basis, because in the event of a sustained break below that line, the bullish thesis could be nullified and traders would likely reduce or exit long positions. Kevin also tied the coin’s fate to the broader crypto landscape, making it clear that a resilient Bitcoin price would be critical if Dogecoin is to maintain its footing near $0.139. He stated, “As long as BTC holds these levels and does not lose 70K then I absolutely love this spot on DOGE,” which reveals his assumption that a weakening Bitcoin would threaten bullish altcoin setups. Related Reading: Dogecoin Faces 1929-Style Reckoning, Bloomberg’s McGlone Warns Even so, he said, “If I were ever looking to properly allocate into Doge then I would definitely take advantage of this spot from a trade perspective,” reflecting his belief in the coin’s potential to remain stable in this range and potentially rally once those higher time frame indicators fully reset. This does not guarantee an imminent Dogecoin rally, but it underscores why Kevin believes the current market structure could allow for greater upside than downside, and why many traders and on-chain enthusiasts are closely monitoring these specific conditions. In summarizing his view of what may come next, Kevin explained, “From a holders perspective it is pretty simple. You have to hold $0.139 while these higher time frame indicators reset and get ready for the next big move.” This sentiment hinges on the notion that once these key momentum and trend-following signals swing from reset levels back toward an upswing, a rally could unfold if external factors (particularly Bitcoin’s performance) remain supportive. He has thus labeled the $0.139 zone as a make-or-break support level—one that, if breached on the weekly chart, could invalidate his bullish stance. If it holds, however, Kevin believes Dogecoin is “ready for the next big move.” At press time, DOGE traded at $0.17534. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Unveiling Stablecoins: The Powerful Force Second Only to Bitcoin in Digital Assets
body: In the ever-evolving world of digital currencies, where new projects and technologies emerge almost daily, it’s easy to get lost in the noise. But amidst this whirlwind of innovation, some voices cut through the static, offering clarity and insight. Recently, Dennis Porter, a prominent figure in the Bitcoin community and co-founder of the Satoshi Action Fund, made a statement that’s resonating across the crypto sphere: stablecoins are second only to Bitcoin (BTC) in their importance within the digital asset realm. This bold declaration prompts us to delve deeper into why stablecoins are garnering such high praise and what it means for the future of crypto adoption and the continued rise of Bitcoin. Why are Stablecoins Considered Second Only to Bitcoin? Dennis Porter’s statement, shared on X, wasn’t just a casual remark. It’s a reflection of the growing recognition of stablecoins as a crucial bridge between traditional finance and the often-volatile cryptocurrency market. To understand why they hold such significance, let’s break down the key aspects: Stability in a Volatile Market: The name itself gives it away. Stablecoins are designed to maintain a stable value, typically pegged to a fiat currency like the US dollar. This stability is a stark contrast to the price fluctuations often seen with cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. On-ramp to Crypto: For many newcomers, the volatility of cryptocurrencies can be daunting. Stablecoins offer a less intimidating entry point. Users can familiarize themselves with digital assets without the immediate fear of dramatic price swings. Facilitating Global Transactions: Stablecoins enable faster, cheaper, and more efficient cross-border transactions compared to traditional banking systems. This is especially crucial in regions with limited access to banking infrastructure. Fueling DeFi and Web3: Decentralized Finance (DeFi) and Web3 ecosystems heavily rely on stablecoins for lending, borrowing, trading, and various other applications. Their stability is essential for the smooth functioning of these innovative platforms. Porter emphasized that wider access to dollar stablecoins could unlock the door for billions of people to participate in the digital economy. This isn’t just about speculation; it’s about providing individuals worldwide with tools for financial inclusion and empowerment. The Dollar Stablecoin Advantage: A Gateway for Billions The focus on dollar stablecoins is particularly noteworthy. The US dollar remains the world’s reserve currency, and its widespread acceptance makes dollar-pegged stablecoins instantly recognizable and trustworthy for a global audience. Imagine the implications: Global Accessibility: For individuals in countries with unstable local currencies or limited access to US dollars, dollar stablecoins offer a readily available and reliable alternative. Simplified International Commerce: Businesses can use dollar stablecoins for international payments, reducing exchange rate risks and transaction costs. Remittances and Cross-border Payments: Migrant workers can send remittances back home more efficiently and affordably using stablecoins, bypassing traditional and often expensive channels. Savings and Investment: In regions with high inflation, dollar stablecoins can serve as a store of value, protecting savings from devaluation. They also provide a pathway for individuals to start saving and planning for future investments, including, as Porter points out, Bitcoin. How Stablecoins Positively Impact Bitcoin and Crypto Adoption Porter’s statement highlights a crucial link between stablecoins and Bitcoin. He suggests that increased access to dollar stablecoins is a positive development for BTC. But how exactly do these two digital assets complement each other? Enhanced Bitcoin Investment Strategy: For those looking to invest in Bitcoin, stablecoins provide a valuable tool for strategic planning. Investors can hold stablecoins during periods of market volatility and easily deploy them to purchase BTC when they see an opportune moment. Reduced Friction in Bitcoin Purchases: Using stablecoins to buy Bitcoin can be more efficient and cost-effective than using traditional fiat currencies in many cases. This streamlined process can encourage greater participation in the Bitcoin market. Expanding the Bitcoin User Base: As more people become comfortable with using stablecoins, they are more likely to explore other cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin. Stablecoins act as a gateway, introducing a wider audience to the potential of the entire digital asset ecosystem. Dollar Users and Bitcoin Demand: Porter specifically mentions “dollar users” as major buyers of Bitcoin. By providing easier access to dollar-pegged stablecoins, the crypto market can tap into a vast pool of potential Bitcoin investors who are already familiar with and trust the US dollar. In essence, stablecoins are not just about their own utility; they play a vital role in fostering broader crypto adoption and strengthening the Bitcoin network. They create a more accessible, stable, and user-friendly environment for everyone to participate in the digital asset revolution. Navigating the Challenges: Regulation and Trust in Stablecoins While the potential of stablecoins is undeniable, it’s important to acknowledge the challenges and concerns surrounding them. The regulatory landscape for stablecoins is still evolving, and issues of transparency, reserves, and potential risks need careful consideration. Key Challenges Include: Challenge Description Regulatory Uncertainty Lack of clear and consistent regulations across different jurisdictions creates uncertainty for stablecoin issuers and users. Reserve Transparency Ensuring that stablecoin issuers hold sufficient and high-quality reserves to back their pegs is crucial for maintaining trust. Centralization Risks Some stablecoins are centralized, raising concerns about censorship and single points of failure. Algorithmic Stablecoin Risks Algorithmic stablecoins, which rely on algorithms rather than reserves to maintain their peg, have faced stability challenges in the past. Addressing these challenges is paramount for the long-term success and widespread acceptance of stablecoins . Ongoing dialogue between regulators, industry players, and the crypto community is essential to develop responsible and effective frameworks. The Future is Stable and Bright for Digital Assets Dennis Porter’s assertion that stablecoins are second only to Bitcoin in importance is a powerful statement that underscores the transformative potential of these digital assets. They are more than just a stable alternative to volatile cryptocurrencies; they are a critical infrastructure component for the entire digital asset ecosystem. By providing stability, accessibility, and a bridge to traditional finance, stablecoins are paving the way for mass crypto adoption and unlocking new opportunities for individuals and businesses worldwide. As the regulatory landscape clarifies and trust in stablecoins grows, their role in the digital economy is only set to become more prominent, further solidifying their position as a cornerstone of the future of finance, right alongside the pioneering force that is Bitcoin. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Top Predictions for Bitcoin, Ethereum & XRP Ahead of Quarterly Close: Here’s What to Expect in Q2 2025
body: The post Top Predictions for Bitcoin, Ethereum & XRP Ahead of Quarterly Close: Here’s What to Expect in Q2 2025 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto markets are gaining strength as they are heading towards the end of the first quarter of 2025. With the Bitcoin price closing the weekly trade above the 200-day MA at $85,058, the altcoins have also gained immense strength. As a result, Ethereum price eyes a bullish close above $2500 while XRP is marching towards $2.5. With the top 3 cryptos gaining strength, here’s what’s expected from BTC, ETH, and XRP prices in Q2 2025. Bitcoin (BTC) Price Prediction for April 2025 From a wider perspective, the Bitcoin price has been maintaining a steep ascending trend regardless of the short-term pullbacks. The price is trading within a rising parallel channel and is trying hard to rise above the average bands of the channel. However, the bearish influence over the token has dropped to a large extent, which suggests a strong bullish continuation for the BTC price rally. The weekly chart of BTC shows the price has triggered a rebound before testing the previous highs close to $72,000. This indicates the prices were allowed to drop to accumulate at the bottom, and as a result, the star token underwent a strong bullish action. The weekly RSI has triggered a bullish divergence, while the weekly MACD shows a drop in the selling pressure after 6 consecutive weeks. This suggests the BTC price is gearing up for massive bullish action, aiming to form a new ATH. Ethereum (ETH) Price Prediction for April 2025 Ethereum price has rebounded from a pivotal support zone around $1800, which mounted some confidence among the market participants. However, the bulls are trying to push the price within a crucial resistance zone between $2067 and $2169, which may validate a rise above the bearish influence. Meanwhile, the technicals trigger a bullish divergence but fail to validate it. Therefore, the upcoming monthly close is expected to be a pivotal one. As seen in the above chart, the ETH price has rebounded from the lower support of the decisive symmetrical triangle. The RSI has flipped from the lower threshold, while a rise above the MA may validate a rise from the bearish influence. On the other hand, the CMF has dropped and is about to test the crucial range at ‘0’, as a drop below the range may validate a bearish trend. Hence, the upcoming monthly close could have a large impact, as a close above $2300 may lay a strong foundation for an extended bullish trend towards upper targets. Ripple (XRP) Price Prediction for April 2025 The XRP price has been consolidating above the gains within a parallel channel after a magnificent rise of over 300%. The price is displaying massive strength and is trying to surpass the crucial threshold above $2.5, which could elevate the levels within a bullish zone. However, the technicals do support a bullish narrative as the XRP price is gearing up for another 300% rise and will mark a double-digit figure soon. The weekly chart of XRP suggests the token is consolidating within a bullish flag and the latest rebound from the support hints at a strong presence of bulls. Previously, the price remained consolidated for over 24 months and hence the price is expected to remain within an accumulated range for a few more days. The RSI continues to form lower highs and lows, while the DMI flashes no clear signals. Therefore, the XRP price remains within a bullish scope but may continue to remain consolidated below $3 for some time and later undergo a massive breakout beyond the range.

title: Pi Network Price: Here’s How Pi Coin May Retain The $1 Mark
body: Pi Network price has continued to stay in the red, losing more than 6% during writing. With the crypto losing the brief $1 support, speculations are high among market watchers over the future performance of the asset. Amid this, a renowned expert has how Pi Coin might retain the $1 support. Pi Network Price Slips Below $1 Pi price today has traded at $0.9432, down 6.3% from yesterday and its one-day volume rose 12% to $284.36 million. Notably, the crypto has managed to soar past the $1 mark today in the last 24 hours, while dropping to a low of $0.9109. Besides, a Pi price prediction indicates that the crypto might slip to $0.71 in April. Notably, it appears that the recent decline comes due to a lack of any positive catalysts in the market. For context, the leading crypto exchange Binance hasn’t confirmed the listing on its platform, which has dampened the investors’ confidence. On the other hand, the lack of any major announcement from the Pi Core team has further weighed on the sentiment. What’s Next For The Crypto? According to Pi Coin enthusiast Dr Altcoin on X , the recent influx of unlocked Pi coins on centralized exchanges (CEXs) has led to a surge in circulating supply. To counter this, the Pi Team may need to burn an additional 60-100 million coins in the coming days. This move, which Dr Altcoin believes, could help drive Pi Network price back to the $1 mark. While investors remain cautious, Dr. Altcoin’s prediction offers a glimmer of hope for Pi Coin’s future. However, with the upcoming token unlocks and other factors, he urged investors to exercise due diligence before putting their bets into the asset. Pi Network Unlock Looms: Here’s All With the upcoming token unlocks, market watchers are speculating over the future trajectory of the Pi Coin. For instance, a total of 97.65 million Pi, worth around $93 million at the current price, will be unlocked over the next 30 days. The average unlock stands at 3.25 million tokens a day and the highest unlock will be around 6.8 million Pi coin on April 3. On the other hand, PiScan data showed that 115.57 million tokens will be unlocked in April, followed by 182 million and 222 million in May and June, respectively. Having said that, these massive unlocks might continue to add pressure on the token’s future performance. But, as Dr Altcoin suggested, if the Pi Core Team decides to conduct the token burns, it could help offset the pressure on the Pi Network price. title: Arthur Hayes Bitcoin Bullish Outlook: Can Institutional Demand Push BTC to $110K?
body: The post Arthur Hayes Bitcoin Bullish Outlook: Can Institutional Demand Push BTC to $110K? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News With Trump’s April 2 tariff deadline approaching, traders are cautious, awaiting clarity on trade rules. Bitcoin has been highly volatile, dropping below $80K before rebounding to $85K last week, but price swings continue. However, this week’s start, Bitcoin is showing renewed strength , climbing toward $87,000 ahead of a key US inflation report. Former BitMEX CEO arthur hayes arthur hayes Arthur Hayes is a Bitcoin advocate and fintech pioneer, best known as the co-founder and former CEO of BitMEX, a leading cryptocurrency trading platform. Launched in 2014, BitMEX has traded trillions in Bitcoin and other digital assets. Hayes, a former Deutsche Bank and Citigroup derivatives trader, became interested in Bitcoin in 2013 after reading Satoshi Nakamoto's white papers. He stepped down as CEO of BitMEX in 2020 following regulatory challenges, including being the first crypto exchange charged under the Bank Secrecy Act. Hayes is recognized as the youngest African American crypto billionaire.DetailsOrganization: BitMexLocation: Hong KongEducation: Bachelor of Science in Economics, Finance from the University of Pennsylvania and Bachelor of Science in Economics and finance from The Wharton SchoolSkills: Trading and SwapsExperience:Chief Investment Officer at Maelstrom from Dec 2022 - PresentCo-Founder at 100x Group from Oct 2020 - PresentCo-founder and CEO at 100x Group from Jul 2019- Oct 2020CEO at BitMEX from Jan 2014 - Oct 2020Delta One Trader (Associate) at Citi from Jun 2011 - May 2013Associate at Deutsche Bank from Jul 2008 - Jun 2011Synthetic Equity Trader at Deutsche Bank from Jun 2008 - Jun 2011FAQ's1. When was Bitmex founded?BitMEX was Launched in 2014.2. What other roles does Arthur Hayes hold?After BitMEX, Hayes became the Chief Investment Officer at Maelstrom Entrepreneur Investor Chief Executive Officer Trader is doubling down on his bullish outlook, predicting a run to $110,000 as he anticipates a shift in Federal Reserve policy . With institutional demand surging and economic data in focus, Bitcoin’s rally appears far from over. Arthur Hayes: Bitcoin’s Next Stop Is $110K Arthur Hayes is confident that Bitcoin will surge to $110,000 before testing the $76,500 mark again. His optimism stems from expectations that the Federal Reserve will soon shift from quantitative tightening (QT) to quantitative easing (QE), a move that could inject more liquidity into risk assets. Hayes also dismissed concerns over Trump’s tariffs, aligning with Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s stance that any inflationary effects will be temporary. Bitcoin is already showing signs of strength, jumping 3.5% to trade above $86,700. Trading volume has surged by 74%, with futures open interest rising 7.79% to over $56 billion. Short sellers have faced heavy liquidations, with $50 million wiped out in the past 24 hours. Overall, the crypto market is also seeing a strong rally, with most altcoins rising alongside Bitcoin. Ethereum is up 3.3% to $2,069, while XRP gained 3.1%. Solana led with a 6.2% jump, followed by Cardano and Polygon at 2% and 2.8%, respectively. Meme coins also surged, with Dogecoin up 3.5% and TRUMP soaring 9.4%, reflecting renewed bullish momentum. Inflation Data Set to Influence Market Sentiment This week, all eyes are on the Federal Reserve’s core PCE price index, the central bank’s preferred inflation gauge. Analysts expect a slight uptick from 2.6% to 2.7%, which could shape market sentiment for risk assets like Bitcoin. The Fed will also release its final one-year inflation forecast, offering further clues on its monetary policy direction. Key Events This Week: 1. S&P Global Manufacturing PMI data – Monday 2. CB Consumer Confidence data – Tuesday 3. February New Home Sales data – Tuesday 4. Atlanta Fed GDPNow data – Wednesday 5. US Q4 2024 GDP data – Thursday 6. title: Urgent Crypto Guide: Key US Economic Events This Week
body: Are you ready for another week of potential market shifts? For cryptocurrency enthusiasts, staying ahead of the curve means not just watching Bitcoin charts, but also keeping a close eye on broader economic indicators. This week is packed with crucial US economic events that could ripple through the crypto market . From Federal Reserve speeches to vital GDP and inflation data, let’s dive into what you need to watch out for to navigate the volatile crypto landscape. Decoding This Week’s Key Economic Events: Why They Matter for Crypto Why should crypto investors care about traditional economic events ? The answer is simple: interconnectedness. The cryptocurrency market, while operating on its own unique principles, is increasingly influenced by macroeconomic factors. Decisions made by the Federal Reserve, for example, directly impact the dollar’s strength, inflation expectations, and overall investor sentiment – all of which can trigger significant movements in crypto prices. Understanding these events provides a crucial edge in making informed trading decisions. Federal Reserve Speakers: Gauging the Pulse of Interest Rates This week features a series of speeches from Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) members. These aren’t just routine talks; they are opportunities to glean insights into the Fed’s current thinking on monetary policy, particularly regarding interest rates . Here’s a breakdown of who’s speaking and when: Monday, March 24 17:45 UTC: FOMC Member Bostic Speaks 19:10 UTC: Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Barr Speaks Tuesday, March 25 12:40 UTC: FOMC Member Kugler Speaks 13:05 UTC: FOMC Member Williams Speaks Wednesday, March 26 14:00 UTC: FOMC Member Kashkari Speaks Thursday, March 27 20:30 UTC: FOMC Member Barkin Speaks Friday, March 28 16:15 UTC: Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Barr Speaks 19:45 UTC: FOMC Member Bostic Speaks What to Watch For: Pay close attention to the tone and key phrases used by these speakers. Are they leaning hawkish (suggesting potential rate hikes to combat inflation) or dovish (indicating a preference for maintaining or lowering rates to support growth)? Hawkish comments can sometimes lead to a stronger dollar and potentially dampen risk assets like crypto, while dovish remarks might have the opposite effect. Keep an ear out for any hints about future policy direction, as this can significantly influence market sentiment. Thursday’s Double Whammy: GDP and Initial Jobless Claims Thursday, March 27th, is a day circled in red on many economists’ calendars, and it should be on yours too. At 12:30 UTC, two critical data points for the US economy are released simultaneously: GDP (QoQ) (Q4): This is the second estimate for the fourth quarter Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth. It’s a broad measure of the US economy ‘s health. Initial Jobless Claims: This weekly report indicates the number of people filing for unemployment benefits for the first time. It’s a timely gauge of the labor market’s strength. Why These Matter: GDP: A strong GDP reading can signal a robust economy, potentially leading to increased investor confidence in risk assets, including crypto. Conversely, a weaker-than-expected GDP could raise concerns about economic slowdown and trigger risk-off behavior. Initial Jobless Claims: Rising jobless claims might suggest a weakening labor market, which could prompt the Federal Reserve to consider a more dovish stance on interest rates . Falling claims indicate a strong labor market, potentially supporting a hawkish stance. Actionable Insight: Compare the released figures against economists’ forecasts. Significant deviations from expectations are what usually trigger the biggest market reactions. For example, a surprisingly strong GDP print combined with lower jobless claims could be interpreted positively for the US economy and potentially for crypto, at least in the short term. Friday’s Inflation Focus: Core PCE Price Index Wrapping up the week on Friday, March 28th, at 12:30 UTC, we get the Core PCE Price Index for February. This is a key inflation gauge closely watched by the Federal Reserve. Core PCE Price Index (Feb.): The Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) Price Index measures the prices paid by people for domestic purchases. The “core” reading excludes volatile food and energy prices, giving a clearer picture of underlying inflation trends. Inflation and Crypto: Inflation is a critical factor influencing the value of fiat currencies. Cryptocurrencies, particularly Bitcoin, are often touted as a hedge against inflation. Higher-than-expected inflation figures could reinforce this narrative, potentially driving demand for cryptocurrencies as investors seek to preserve their purchasing power. Conversely, if inflation data comes in lower than expected, it might ease concerns about aggressive interest rate hikes and could still be viewed positively by the market , though the immediate “inflation hedge” narrative might weaken slightly. The Fed’s Stance: The Core PCE is arguably the Fed’s preferred inflation measure. If this data shows persistent or rising inflation, it strengthens the case for the Federal Reserve to maintain or even increase interest rates . Conversely, easing inflation could give them room to pause or even consider future rate cuts. The market reaction will heavily depend on how this data aligns with, or deviates from, prevailing expectations. Navigating the Week Ahead: Key Takeaways for Crypto Traders This week presents a dynamic landscape for crypto traders. By carefully monitoring these economic events , particularly the Federal Reserve speakers, GDP, jobless claims, and the Core PCE inflation data, you can gain a significant advantage in understanding potential market movements. Remember: Stay Informed: Keep an eye on economic news releases and analyst commentary throughout the week. Context is Key: Don’t just look at the numbers in isolation. Understand how they fit into the broader US economy and global economic picture. Prepare for Volatility: Economic data releases and Fed speeches can trigger increased volatility in the crypto market . Manage your risk accordingly. Long-Term Perspective: While these events can cause short-term fluctuations, remember to maintain a long-term perspective on your crypto investments. By staying informed and understanding the interplay between traditional economic events and the crypto market , you can navigate this week with greater confidence and potentially capitalize on emerging opportunities. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.
